name: Poppy Runner
description:
(This game is made during the Vancouver Film School March 10 - 12, 2023 Game Jam and further polished afterwards.)

Poppy Runner is a 3D top-down isometric low-poly hack-n-slash platformer.

Play as Pablo, a “flower” delivery guy and collect poppy flowers -> convert them to “goods” -> sell them to customers.

Convert poppy flowers into the goods in fast-paced gameplay and deliver them to customers within a certain timeframe.

Sprint, attack, double jump or slide under various obstacles to overcome a multitude of things in your way, such as platforms, police officers, vehicles, and more.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Sprint: Shift

Slide: Ctrl

Attack: Left Mouse-Click
